narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This is a focused inspection concerning only the non-compliant items listed under 2.40 (b)(2) on inspection report
dated June 16, 2016.  The following dogs have been evaluated by a licensed veterinarian and are under a treatment
plan:
Female Yorkshire terrier ("Little Daisy", Tag #32, DOB 2008)
Female Yorkshire terrier (Tag #78)
Female Maltese ("Dolly", Tag #82)
The following dog was evaluated by a licensed veterinarian and is no longer at the facility:
Female Yorkshire terrier ("Fluffy", Tag #84)
 Exit interview conducted with Kelly Maxwell, ACI and the facility representative.
